description:
A Pearl Izumi classic has been updated with recycled materials. Fans of the Attack jersey will be happy to know that the latest generation is just as wicking, and just as comfy as the original, only now it has a smaller footprint.

  • Part of Pearl Izumi’s Pedal to Zero™ initiative, going 15km by bike – instead of driving, and you’ve completely offset the climate impact of this jersey
  • Made of Select Transfer yarns created from recycled plastic water bottles, this material has amazing wicking properties and a comfortable stretch
  • 3 drop-in rear pockets
  • Full-length front zipper
  • Reflective elements increase your safety in low-light conditions
  • Elasticized gripper on the hem keeps it from creeping up
name: Pearl Izumi Attack Jersey - Men's
